FuncDef:
The set power pm single-input command opens the single plain power input function.
The undo set power pm single-input command closes the single plain power input function.
By default, the single plain power input function is disable.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the power module ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 16.

Specifies the plain of power input.
Plain A.Plain B.
The value is a string of 1 to 257 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: [~HUAWEI] set power 17 pm A1 single-input A
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If there is no double plain power input circumstance, the single plain power input function can be used to support devices.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
Make sure that the device power is enough to for the single plain power input function.
Index Attention(In English) Product Products 0 If the set power pm single-input command is run on a device that uses AC or HVDC power, the following error message is displayed: Error: The configuration failed because the system power was not the DC type.
